QuestData.Title: Subtle Encouragement
QuestData.Description: The saurok are vile, but we share an enemy: the mogu. And I'd rather send saurok to kill mogu than send my own men.$b$bWe've been collecting mogu weaponry. Bury these polearms into the skulls of the saurok. Feed our enemies' rivalry, and you may save Alliance lives.
QuestData.LogDescription: Plant Mogu Weapons into the corpses of 9 Skumblade saurok.

Objectives.Objective: Use Mogu Weapon on Skumblade corpse
